content.question: The last sentence of the first paragraph (“That . . . month’s rent”) primarily serves to

choices.label: justify an action by invoking an ethical principle
clarify a point by defining an ambiguous term
show how anecdotal evidence supports a claim
demonstrate that a common practice has harmful effects

content.answer: show how anecdotal evidence supports a claim

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
